item.title: Hugo & GitHub - Setup Static Website on GitHub
item.description: Hugo and Github Account Here I will write a small write-up on how this site was setup. There are plenty of materials available all over, but this is more of a self-help as it will serve me as a reminder in future to refer back and understand how this was all setup. Hugo can be downloaded from the release page GitHub account can be create here and a public repo is required to be setup from here After installing Hugo, to generate a new site you can run the below commands:
